question: What is the total revenue (sum of Invoice.Total) across all invoices? Round to 2 decimals.
gt_sql: SELECT ROUND(SUM(Total), 2) AS total_revenue FROM Invoice;

question: Which genre has the most tracks? Return genre name and track count.
gt_sql: SELECT g.Name AS genre_name, COUNT(t.TrackId) AS track_count FROM Genre g JOIN Track t ON g.GenreId = t.GenreId GROUP BY g.GenreId ORDER BY track_count DESC, genre_name ASC LIMIT 1;
